attributes.action: ban the sale of kittens from pet shops.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We believe the buying and selling of kittens from pet shops and other
retail outlets, and the keeping of such animals on these premises for
the purpose of sale:

- is detrimental to the health and wellbeing of the animals concerned

- actively encourages backstreet breeding of kittens for financial
gain

- has the very serious effect of ensuring that the many thousands of
cats and kittens already in rescues up and down the country have less
chance of being rehomed.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to ban the sale of kittens from pet shops.

Her Majesty's Government has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.hmg.gov.uk/epetition-responses/petition-view.aspx?epref=petshopkittens


Her Majesty's Government
